author: ET Now
title: When the virus passes, expect an equally sharp rebound in economic activity: Sajjid Z Chinoy
description: In 2008 we knew what the shock was and how to respond, says chief India economist, JP Morgan
content: How much worse can it get from here? We were not in a recessionary scenario but we were just about sluggishly moving along?To start with, we are in a period of unquantifiable uncertainty. It is very hard to figure out what the eventual impact on growth is goi… [+14956 chars]
